Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the Amazon MQ configuration ID. For example:

c-1234a5b6-78cd-901e-2fgh-3i45j6k178l9

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon MQ configuration.  arn:aws:mq:us-east-2:123456789012:configuration:MyConfigurationDevelopment:c-1234a5b6-78cd-901e-2fgh-3i45j6k178l9
The ID of the Amazon MQ configuration.  c-1234a5b6-78cd-901e-2fgh-3i45j6k178l9
The revision number of the configuration.  1
